description: This is not anti-vax, it’s pro-freedom. It is pro having the right to treat the body the way nature intended and allow it to exist holistically and live in alignment with your own values. Do some research into sudden infant death syndrome. Try to find stories about unvaccinated babies suddenly dying because statistically speaking it’s not even comparable. People make jokes about unvaccinated kids dying but the truth is they are on average far healthier. And yet, we systematically ASSAULT babies instantly, before they are even alive for 24 hours by injecting foreign particulates into their bloodstream! It’s such a shame we put so much faith as a society into a fraudulent medical system. And now we’re about to be forced to get vaccinated as adults. You won’t be allowed to travel or gather in public without a vaccine. They keep saying things can’t go back to normal until the world gets vaccinated- and that sounds like a threat to me. There’s a reason athletes are Willing to risk their careers they’ve spent their lives working for in order to resist tyranny! Vaccines are already mandatory in other countries which has been justified through the pandemic - don’t let us be next!! #wakeup #freedom #truth #vaccines #corona #needlepoint #nwo #billgatesisevil #billgatesfoundation
